N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 490.4 - Projections

State Regulations

The tables in subdivisions (a), (b), and (c) of this
section establish projected sea level rise for the specified geographic region
relative to the baseline level. (a) Mid-Hudson Region
